name: Keepers Of The Age (Demo)
description:
KEEPERS OF THE AGE

This demo will capture a short but rich action-adventure experience in the Keepers Of The Age universe. Explore the evolving depths of an ancient castle, sunken into enchanted crystal caverns that have long been guarded by corrupted dragons. Combat the undead, necromancers, orcs, dragons, and (if you're skilled enough) The Black Knight mini-boss. As you explore the crypts of these ruins you will begin to awaken the Ancients and their runes...

NOTES TO THE PLAYER:

  - This demo currently supports xbox style gamepad controllers and keyboard/mouse.

  - For best performance, download and play the Windows version linked below.

  - Play the tutorial to get familiar with the controls before attempting the main demo.
